title: $:/plugins/tobibeer/external
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/config": { "title": "$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/config", "text": "Configure external wikis under `$:/config/ExternalWiki/` specifying: ; text : the url of the wiki (w/o final `#`) ; top : a top margin ignored when rendering, e.g. wiki header ; link : whether to display a link to the title ; height : default iframe height for wiki These defaults provide global fallbacks: <>" }, "$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/defaults/top": { "title": "$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/defaults/top", "text": "0px" }, "$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/defaults/height": { "title": "$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/defaults/height", "text": "480px" }, "$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/defaults/link": { "title": "$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/defaults/link", "text": "yes" }, "$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/lingo/open": { "title": "$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/lingo/open", "text": "view at ''<>''" }, "$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/depends": { "title": "$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/depends", "text": "This plugin depends on: * [[tobibeer/setvars|http://tobibeer.github.io/tw5-plugins/#setvars]] * [[tobibeer/split|http://tobibeer.github.io/tw5-plugins/#split]]
; documentation / examples / demos... : http://tobibeer.github.io/tw5-plugins#external" }, "$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/macro": { "title": "$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/macro", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "text": "\define external-tiddler(wiki,title,height,top,link) <$setvars _wiki = "[all[current]split:first[: ]]" _wiki_default={{$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/defaults/wiki}} WIKI=" (\$wiki$\ ? \$wiki$\) || ([wiki] ? [wiki]) || wiki_default"> <$setvars CONFIG="[config]" _config="[addprefix[$:/config/ExternalWiki/]]"> <$list filter="[]" variable="none"> <$setvars _title="""[all[current]split[: ]]""" _height={{!!height}} _height_wiki="[get[height]]" _height_default={{$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/defaults/height}} _top="[get[top]]" _top_default={{$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/defaults/top}} _server="[get[text]]" _link="[get[link]]" _link_default={{$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/defaults/link}} LINK=" (\$link$\ ? \$link$\) || ([link] ? [link]) || link_default" TITLE=""" (\$title$\ ? \$title$\) || [title[2,n][][: ]]""" URL="""[server]\#\TITLE""" TOP=" (\$top$\ ? \$top$\ ) || ([top] ? [top] ) || top_default" HEIGHT=" (\$height$\ ? \$height$\) || (height ? height) || ([height_wiki] ? [height_wiki]) || height_default" HEIGHT_INNER=" \calc(\ HEIGHT \ + \ TOP \)\" STYLE=" \height:\HEIGHT\;\" STYLEFRAME=" \height:\HEIGHT_INNER\;top:-\TOP\;\"> <$list filter="[prefix[yes]]"> > target="_blank">{{$:/plugins/tobibeer/external/lingo/open}}
>>
author: Tobias Beer
description: A macro and template to embed tiddlers from external wikis
